text_en: The complex world is confusing for the Deafblind. They donâ€™t know where the things come from. Things appear and disappear.
text_sw: Ulimwengu unawatatiza watu ambao wana uziwi na kutoona. Hawajui vitu vinatoka wapi. Vitu vinatokea na kutoweka.

text_en: The kitchen garden gives the  learners an opportunity to know where the vegetables they eat during the day come from.
text_sw: Bustani kwa ajili ya jikoni huwapatia wanafunzi fursa ya kujua mboga mboga wanazokula mchana hutoka wapi.

text_en: Where do the bananas come from, where do the maize come from?
text_sw: Ndizi hutoka wapi, mahindi hutoka wapi?

text_en: The  learners get involved in the process of doing the seedbed, the planting, the watering.
text_sw: Wanafunzi wanashiriki katika mchakato wa kutengeneza matuta ya mbegu, kupanda, kumwagilia maji.

text_en: We want them to be whole human beings when leaving Kilimani.
text_sw: Tunawataka wawe wanadamu kamili wanapoondoka Kilimani.

text_en: When work is done, it is time for a high five.
text_sw: Kama kazi imemalizika ni muda wa heko ya tano iliyokuwa juu.
